Important Articles.headline: ZURICH & EVANSVILLE, Ind., February 26, 2025--Amcor plc (NYSE: AMCR; ASX: AMC) ("Amcor"), today announced a solicitation of consents (the "Consent Solicitations") from all registered holders (the "Holders") of the 1.50% First Priority Senior Secured Notes due 2027 (the "EUR Notes"), 1.65% First Priority Senior Secured Notes due 2027 (the "2027 USD Notes"), 5.50% First Priority Senior Secured Notes due 2028 (the "2028 USD Notes"), 5.800% First Priority Senior Secured Notes due 2031 (the "2031 USD
Important Articles.title: Amcor Announces Consent Solicitations for Berry’s Outstanding Notes

Important Articles.headline: Amcor (NYSE: AMCR) (ASX:AMC), a global leader in developing and producing responsible packaging solutions, announced the extension of the application period for a new challenge under its Amcor Lift-Off initiative, the Amcor Lift-Off Sprints. The challenge aims to support innovative companies that provide new, innovative compostable or recyclable barrier coatings solutions for paper and other compostable substrates.
Important Articles.title: Amcor Lift-Off initiative extends deadline for compostable or recyclable barrier coating solution challenge
